main.title: GerpBot
main.description: List of commands. Use `@GerpBot help <command>` for more details.

fields.name: `@GerpBot help`
fields.value: Displays this message.

fields.name: `@GerpBot server`
fields.value: Gives information about the server.

fields.name: `@GerpBot channel`
fields.value: Gives information about the channel.

fields.name: `@GerpBot user`
fields.value: Gives information about the user.

fields.name: `@GerpBot role`
fields.value: Gives information about the role.

fields.name: `@GerpBot osu`
fields.value: Check osu! user's profile.

fields.name: `@GerpBot raffle`
fields.value: Randomly selects user(s) from given category.

fields.name: `@GerpBot ping`
fields.value: Pong!

fields.name: `@GerpBot pi`
fields.value: Gives you the π.

fields.name: `@GerpBot rng`
fields.value: Generates a random number(s).

fields.name: `@GerpBot nerfThis`
fields.value: Activates D.Va's ultimate ability "Self destruct".

fields.name: `@GerpBot echo`
fields.value: GerpBot responds with the same message. This command will have **no** issues.

fields.name: `@GerpBot uptime`
fields.value: Get uptime since a specific event.

fields.name: `@GerpBot ask`
fields.value: Ask anything! Even works without the `ask` -part, if `?` is used instead: `@GerpBot [<question>]... ? [<question>]...`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot vote`
fields.value: Starts a vote. A really cool one.

fields.name: `@GerpBot play`
fields.value: Adds songs to queue and starts playing. Attachments also supported and must be part of the same message as the command.

fields.name: `@GerpBot music`
fields.value: Music commands and control. Use `@GerpBot play` to start playing.

fields.name: `@GerpBot bs`
fields.value: Play the Blue Square the Game.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps`
fields.value: Play KPS.

fields.name: `@GerpBot ile`
fields.value: For more info: `@GerpBot ile`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot remind`
fields.value: Add, list and cancel reminders. Details: `@GerpBot help remind`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot timezone`
fields.value: Set your time zone for the bot.

fields.name: `@GerpBot autoCompliment`
fields.value: Automatic compliments.

fields.name: `@GerpBot shit`
fields.value: Makes one role shit.

fields.name: `@GerpBot color`
fields.value: Changes bot's color.

fields.name: `@GerpBot effect`
fields.value: Toggles GerpBot name effects.

fields.name: Shorter versions of commands are also available:
fields.value:
`nt` - `nerfThis`
`ut` - `uptime`
`tz` - `timezone`
`aa` - `autoAnswer`
`ac` - `autoCompliment`

help.title: Help for `help` -command
help.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot help [<command>]`
Wait, help for help? Well, just type some other command instead of the second help. Yes?

server.title: Help for `server` -command
server.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot server`
Gives information about the server.

fields.name: Server only
fields.value: Servers only exist in... servers?

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - required. Server information is delivered inside an embed.

channel.title: Help for `channel` -command
channel.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot channel [<#channel>]`
Gives information about the channel.

fields.name: Server only
fields.value: Channels only exist in servers.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - required. Channel information is delivered inside an embed.

user.title: Help for `user` -command
user.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot user <@mention>`
Gives information about the user.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - required. User information is delivered inside an embed.

role.title: Help for `role` -command
role.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot role <@role>`
Gives information about the role.

fields.name: Server only
fields.value: Roles only exist in servers.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - required. Role information is delivered inside an embed.

osu.title: Help for `osu` -command
osu.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot osu <user>`
Check osu! user's profile.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - required. Osu! information is delivered inside an embed.

raffle.title: Help for `raffle` -command
raffle.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot raffle [everyone|here|<@role>] [<number of winners>]`
Randomly selects user(s) from given category.

fields.name: Server only
fields.value: Raffle can only be used in servers.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - required. Raffle results are delivered inside an embed.

ping.title: Help for `ping` -command
ping.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot ping`
Pong! Bot go pong when you go ping. Unuseful for ping-pong!

pi.title: Help for `pi` -command
pi.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot pi`
Gives you the π.

rng.title: Help for `rng` -command
rng.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot rng <number>[..<number>] [<amount>]`
Get a random number (or numbers). Lowest and highest value as inputs. If only one number is given the result will be between the entered number and zero.

fields.name: Examples
fields.value:
`rng 0..2` number between 0 and 2.
`rng 10` number between 0 and 10.
`rng 3..15 8` 8 numbers between 3 and 15.
`rng -3..6` number between -3 and 6.
`rng -10 20` 20 numbers between -10 and 0.

nerfThis.title: Help for `nerfThis` -command
nerfThis.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot nerfThis`
Activates D.Va's ultimate ability "Self destruct".

fields.name: Shortcut
fields.value: `@GerpBot nt`

echo.title: Help for `echo` -command
echo.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot echo <message>...`
GerpBot responds with the same message. This command will have **no** issues since they have already been fixed a long time ago.

uptime.title: Help for `uptime` -command
uptime.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot uptime startUp | connection | lastCommand`
Get uptime since a specific event.

fields.name: `@GerpBot uptime startUp`
fields.value: How long has bot's script been running without a fatal crash.

fields.name: `@GerpBot uptime connection`
fields.value: How long has bot been connected to Discord without disconnecting.

fields.name: `@GerpBot uptime lastCommand`
fields.value: How long time ago was the last command used.

fields.name: Shortcut
fields.value: `@GerpBot ut`

ask.title: Help for `ask` -command
ask.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot ask <question>`
Ask anything! Even works without the `ask` -part, if `?` is used instead: `@GerpBot [<question>]... ? [<question>]...`.

vote.title: Help for `vote` -command
vote.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot vote [gold <@mention>] <emoji1>[=<option1>]...`
Starts a vote. A really cool one.

fields.name: Gold vote
fields.value: Optional `[gold <@mention>]` changes vote into a golden weapon vote for the mentioned user.

fields.name: Adding choices
fields.value: Add things to vote for with `<emoji1>[=<option1>]...`. Select your favourite emoji(s) and label the choices with descriptive names (optional). Examples: `:thinking:=Genius` or `:ok_hand:`

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value:
`Manage Messages` - required. Vote message will be auto-pinned.

`Embed Links` - required. Vote is delivered inside an embed.

`Read Message History` - required. Message history needs to be available for the auto-pin and choice auto-add.

`Add Reactions` - required. Vote choices are auto-added to vote message.

play.title: Help for `play` -command
play.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot play [<keywords>...]`
Adds songs to queue and starts playing. Attachments also supported and must be part of the same message as the command.

fields.name: Keywords
fields.value: Keywords are used in a YouTube search and first matching video's audio will be played.

fields.name: Attachments
fields.value: Use this command while uploading files to play their audio! Overrides keyword search.

fields.name: Voice channel
fields.value: This command only works when you are in a voice channel, which the bot can access.

fields.name: Server only
fields.value: Audio playback only works in servers.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value:
`View channel` - required. Bot needs to be able to view voice channel before joining. Notice: Sometimes called `Read Messages`.

`Connect` - required. Fun fact: You can make bot follow you to another voice channel by re-doing the command. Audio playback will not be interrupted.

`Speak` - strongly recommended. How can one play music without voice?

music.title: Help for `music` -command
music.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot music (cancel <number>) | skip | stop | list | channel`
Music commands and control. Use `@GerpBot play` to start playing.

fields.name: `@GerpBot music cancel <number>`
fields.value: Cancels a queued song. You can only cancel songs you have queued yourself. Use `@GerpBot music list` to check the numbers.

fields.name: `@GerpBot music skip`
fields.value: Skips the current song and plays next in queue if available. Don't be mean and skip other people's favourites, please.

fields.name: `@GerpBot music stop`
fields.value: Stops the music playback. Restart music from next song with `@GerpBot play`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot music list`
fields.value: Get a list of songs in the queue and current song info.

fields.name: `@GerpBot music channel`
fields.value: Set the music announcement channel. Only server admins are allowed to use this command.

fields.name: Server only
fields.value: Audio playback only works in servers.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - required. Music functionality usually uses embeds as status messages.

bs.title: Help for `bs` -command
bs.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot bs`
Play the Blue Square the Game. Move around the grid in this multiplayer game tech demo.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value:
`Manage Messages` - required. Using reactions as controls means that they will have to be auto-removed for smoother usage.

`Embed Links` - required. Game area is inside an embed.

`Read Message History` - required. Message history needs to be available for the controls (reactions) to be added.

`Add Reactions` - required. Controls are auto-added to the embed message.

kps.title: Help for `kps` -command
kps.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot kps play | ai | friend <name> | rock | paper | scissors | classic | horror | space | hand | quit`
Play KPS.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps play`
fields.value: Adds you into the waiting line for an opponent.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps ai`
fields.value: Starts KPS match with a computer opponent.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps friend <name>`
fields.value: Searches for a friend who needs to be online but cannot be in a match. Discord users are automatically assigned a name based on their username and discriminator.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps rock`
fields.value: Chooses rock as your next move.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps paper`
fields.value: Chooses paper as your next move.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps scissors`
fields.value: Chooses scissors as your next move.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps classic`
fields.value: Classic theme. Sets "classic" as your theme.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps horror`
fields.value: Bloody and spooky. Sets "horror" as your theme.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps space`
fields.value: Wierd objects, from SPACE? Sets "space" as your theme.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps hand`
fields.value: Gray hands, what else? Sets "hand" as your theme.

fields.name: `@GerpBot kps quit`
fields.value: Disconnects your account from KPS servers.

ile.title: Help for `ile` -command
ile.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot ile join | leave | here | time`
For more info: `@GerpBot ile`.

fields.name: Useless game with no purpose
fields.value: Join the game and receive a start time. Be present during that time and claim the glory!

fields.name: `@GerpBot ile join`
fields.value: Allows you to participate. Check your DMs.

fields.name: `@GerpBot ile leave`
fields.value: Need a break? Stops the announcements for ILE-game and disables your ability to participate. Join back with `@GerpBot ile join`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot ile here`
fields.value: When the time comes, use this to mark yourself present. No cheating!

fields.name: `@GerpBot ile time`
fields.value: Forgot the start time? No worries.

remind.title: Help for `remind` -command
remind.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot remind [<#channel>|<@mention>] (([<amount>](ms|s|min|h|d|y))...|[<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T]<HH>:<MM>[:<SS>]) [<message>]...`
Reminds after a specific amount of time or at a specific time. Can be sent to another channel or person (DM). A message can also be displayed.
Usage: `@GerpBot remind list | (cancel <number>)`
Gives you a list of your reminders or cancel one of your reminders.

fields.name: First part `[<#channel>|<@mention>]`
fields.value: Target channel or DM, must be a mention (optional, default current channel).

fields.name: Second part (timer mode) `([<amount>](ms|s|min|h|d|y))...`
fields.value: Amount of time before reminder activates. Can have multiple units: `5h 2min`. If no number is added, amount will be one: `1d` is same as `d`.

fields.name: Second part (alarm mode) `[<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T]<HH>:<MM>[:<SS>]`
fields.value: Specific time for reminder. Date and seconds are optional. Mind the time zones. Examples: `2022-3-28T16:40`, `08:35`, `02:10:59`. `2017-12-08T19:05:46`

fields.name: Third part [<message>]...
fields.value: Your message to be displayed with the reminder (optional, default empty). Supports mentions (@ and #).

fields.name: Time zone
fields.value: GerpBot has built-in time zone support. Set yours today: `@GerpBot tz`!

fields.name: `@GerpBot remind list`
fields.value: Get a list of your upcoming reminders.

fields.name: `@GerpBot remind cancel <number>`
fields.value: Cancel one of your reminders. Use `@GerpBot remind list` to check the numbers.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - complicated. Reminders are embeds and GerpBot needs the permission for the target channel, but setting a reminder doesn't involve embeds. Embeds are needed for listing reminders.

timezone.title: Help for `timezone` -command
timezone.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot timezone +<HH>:<MM> | -<HH>:<MM>`
Set your time zone for the bot.

fields.name: `@GerpBot timezone +<HH>:<MM> | -<HH>:<MM>`
fields.value: Set your own personal time zone. Based on UTC. Examples: `+03:00`, `-10:30`, `+07:15`

fields.name: `@GerpBot timezone (+<HH>:<MM>|-<HH>:<MM>) server`
fields.value: Sets default time zone used in the current server. Only server admins are allowed to use this command.

fields.name: Shortcut
fields.value: `@GerpBot tz`

autoCompliment.title: Help for `autoCompliment` -command
autoCompliment.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot autoCompliment sample | on | off | add <@mention> | remove <@mention> | list`
Automatic complimentation for cool people.

fields.name: `@GerpBot autoCompliment sample`
fields.value: Gives you a random compliment.

fields.name: `@GerpBot autoCompliment on`
fields.value: Turns on automatic complimentation for the server.

fields.name: `@GerpBot autoCompliment off`
fields.value: Turns off automatic complimentation for the server.

fields.name: `@GerpBot autoCompliment add`
fields.value: Adds a server member to the VIP complimentation list.

fields.name: `@GerpBot autoCompliment remove`
fields.value: Removes a server member from the VIP complimentation list.

fields.name: `@GerpBot autoCompliment list`
fields.value: Reveals VIP complimentation list.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Embed Links` - recommended. Cool people look cool on a cool list in a cool embed. Cool.

fields.name: Admin only
fields.value: Only server admins are allowed to use this command. The `sample` -command is an exeption.

fields.name: Shortcut
fields.value: `@GerpBot ac`

shit.title: Help for `shit` -command
shit.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot shit set <@role> | clean`
Makes one role shit.

fields.name: `@GerpBot shit set <@role>`
fields.value: Sets mentioned role as the shittiest in the server. There can only be one.

fields.name: `@GerpBot shit clean`
fields.value: Removes current role from the shit status.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Add Reactions` - required. How does one shit without the power of emojis?

fields.name: Admin only
fields.value: Only server admins are allowed to use this command.

color.title: Help for `color` -command
color.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot color #<hex> | <decimal> | default`
Changes bot's color.

fields.name: `@GerpBot color #<hex>`
fields.value: Set bot's color with hexadecimal color code. Example: `#FF6A00`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot color <decimal>`
fields.value: Set bot's color with decimal color code. Example: `16738816`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot color default`
fields.value: Set bot's color to default.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value: `Manage roles` - required. GerpBot will create a role for color effects.

fields.name: Admin only
fields.value: Only server admins are allowed to use this command.

effect.title: Help for `effect` -command
effect.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot effect rainbow | shuffle`
Toggles GerpBot name effects.

fields.name: `@GerpBot effect rainbow`
fields.value: Toggle bot name rainbow color.

fields.name: `@GerpBot effect shuffle`
fields.value: Toggle bot name randomization.

fields.name: Permission info
fields.value:
`Change Nickname` - required. For nickname change?
`Manage roles` - required. GerpBot will create a role for color effects.

fields.name: Admin only
fields.value: Only server admins are allowed to use this command.
